00219     virtual double entropy( )
00220     {
00221         double   t;
00222                 unsigned i;
00223 
00224                 for( t = 0, i = monteCarloTrials; i--; )
00225                 {
00226                         t += log( p( ( *this )( ) ) );
00227                 }
00228 
00229                 return -t / monteCarloTrials;
00230     }
00231

00233    //========================================================================
00269     virtual double KullbackLeibler( const RandomVar< T >& rv )
00270     {
00271         double   t;
00272                 unsigned i;
00273                 T        x;
00274 
00275                 for( t = 0, i = monteCarloTrials; i--; )
00276                 {
00277                         x  = ( *this )( );
00278                         t += log( p( x ) / rv.p( x ) );
00279                 }
00280 
00281                 return t / monteCarloTrials;
00282     }
00283 
00284    //========================================================================
00311     virtual double logLikelihood( const std::vector< T >& x ) const
00312     {
00313         double l = 0;
00314 
00315                 for( unsigned k = x.size( ); k--; )
00316                 {
00317                         l += log( p( x[ k ] ) );
00318                 }
00319 
00320                 return l;
00321     }
